name: curtainWall
description:
It’s entirely possible—and desirable—to transform a rudimentary scene from one with hard edges and harsh light to that of smooth curves and sinuous movements. With this work, organic movements and dithered frames result in a looping gif that entices the viewer to watch just that little bit longer.

GIF
640x360
300 frames, 30fps

by @ecomfort_arts
November 2021
